title: Mallow

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Psychopath**: Pick a player, if they have flavor text on the role post, learn their role, if they don't have it, roleblock them.
- **HP Rain**: All players sharing your faction gain Powerful defense this night. (2 uses)
- **Star Rain**: only usable if converted to another faction, Deal an Unstoppable attack to 3 players and convert yourself back to the Koopa faction. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If the last Koopa member alive, you convert your faction to the Good faction in the game.
- If converted in any way, you always keep your role, only your faction will change, if the game would end after you convert, it will last until the end of another night.
- Rain abilities are astral.
